sentences.sentence: Conclusion Function of knee joint contracture was improved using knee orthosis.
sentences.translation: 结论矫形器治疗能明显改善挛缩兔膝关节功能。

sentences.sentence: Lower limb exoskeleton orthosis was used as rehabilitation device in gait training.
sentences.translation: 设计用于步态康复训练的下肢外骨骼矫形器。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the effect of long leg orthosis on lower limb function rehabilitation of hemiplegics.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨穿戴长下肢矫形器对重度偏瘫患者下肢功能康复的特点。
